name: Tarntawan Place Hotel

reviews.title: Convenient Location
reviews.text: Location was very handy being so close to the stytrain, about 5 mins walk. And if you like Patpong it practically on the doorstep, 2 mins walk.

reviews.title: Terrific Tarntawan Place Hotel
reviews.text: The hotel was clean and staff very friendly, good value for money considering the rates per night. There was a problem with ants in the room and the building site behind the hotel which seemed to only work in the eveing or morning due to the heat, which at times was quite noisy.

One word of warning this hotel caters for the gay community and if you're not ok with that I'd recommend you stay well away. Plus, we stayed here 5 nights and did not see one female guest, other than my Wife.
reviews.title: Love the Tarntawan Place Hotel

reviews.text: Also, if you are staying with a partner you may be questioned by the hotel security before entering the hotel lift on an evening, which can be uncomfortable if for instance it's your Wife with you.
reviews.title: Very Reliable Choice
Great hotel
reviews.text: Other than that I see no potential problems for anyone staying here.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I cannot praise the staff here enough , from the So friendly / helpful reception to the management , even the security guy by the elevator was so courteous and seemed over whelmed when i tipped him on our departure. The location is second to none, near all the bars and clubs, restaurants , and near to sky train.
reviews.title: FANTASTIC staff / service

reviews.text: we booked airport collection , but there was no one waiting for us , but when i told the management , they went out of their way to make it up to us . Shame there is no pool : (, but for a cheap hotel this place is the best , and as mentioned before very gay friendly and safe . Hope to go back there again in the future.
reviews.title: Great Hotel Service!
Good gay hotel
reviews.text: The rooms may be just alright, but Tarntawan Place is a great hotel, primarily from its service. Its staff is very friendly. Since I had prebooked my room, as soon as I got in, they gave me printed calling cards with my name with the hotel location (which is right in the Silom/Surawong area). It has free internet service in the lobby. You can avail of its breakfast the whole day, so if you are on a budget you can have it for lunch or dinner. There is no problem in bringing in guests to the room. They just have to register with the security guard by the elevator, and the lobby calls in once they leave to make sure you are alright.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Once I complained since there was a construction which started early in the morning and disturbed my sleep. I found out it was coming from their neighbor. But still they were apologetic, and gave me a coupon for a free night's stay the next time. For my next trip, I wanted to claim the coupon, but they were fully booked. The hotel went out of its way to book me in another hotel, in a suite! And that was even though I only had a regular room during my previous stay.
reviews.title: Loved It!!

reviews.text: I tried other hotels during other stays in Bangkok, but none has come close to the service that Tarntawan Place had provided me. Keep it up!
reviews.title: Excellent Choice
Excellent!!
reviews.text: The Tarntawan Place Hotel, I cannot let another day go by without thinking of and thanking for the services and atmosphere with which were provided to me during my recent stay. I was completely satisfied, better, delighted with my experience there. The location is excellent. The facilities are just fine for a traveler such as myself. They provide superb value for cost. Most importantly, however, they have a wonderful, warm and friendly staff. Every one of them whom I met made me, a "stranger in a strange land," feel welcomed and appreciated. I learned firsthand the meaning of "The Land of Smiles" from delighttful staff. I know that I will return to Bangkok again. One visit was not enough. And when I do, I will stay again at Tarntawan Place Hotel. I look forward to that return visit.

description: The Tarntawan Place is a well established, modern hotel. The rooms are stylishly appointed, spacious and light, creating a friendly and intimate atmosphere. Our personalized service and attention to detail ensure a special comfort and charm. Situated in a quiet courtyard off Surawong Road in the heart of Bangkok's business and entertainment district, the Tarntawan Place is within walking distance of international banks, shopping centeres and major airline offices. The Skytrain overhead railway (Sala Daeng Station) and Subway (Sam Yan and Silom Stations) are both just a few steps away.The famous shopping and nightlife areas of Silom and Patpong are just around the corner.
